Notes.Text:
This update for libvpx fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-9232: Fixed an out of bound memory access (bsc#1160613).
- CVE-2019-9433: Fixdd a use-after-free in vp8_deblock() (bsc#1160614).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: In libvpx, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID: A-122675483
